db:abstract.db:para: Demonstrates usage of the Qt D-Bus typesystem.

db:article.db:para: Complex Ping Pong example demonstrates the use of Qt D-Bus typesystem with QDBusVariant and QDBusReply. The example consists of the main application complexping which starts the other application, complexpong. Entering keywords such as hello and ping is handled by complexpong and the reply is printed to the standard output.

db:section.db:title: Running the Example
db:section.db:para: To run the example from Qt Creator, open the Welcome mode and select the example from Examples. For more information, visit Building and Running an Example.
To run, execute the complexping application.
db:section.db:programlisting: $ ./complexping Ask your question: When is the next Qt release? Reply was: Sorry, I don't know the answer Ask your question: What is the answer to life, the universe and everything? Reply was: 42
